verses.verse: "Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3277>mountain<s%> <S%H5553><s%> <S%H3277>goats<s%> <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%>? Do you <S%H8104>observe<s%> the <S%H9123>calving<s%> of the <S%H355>deer<s%>?
"Can you <S%H5608>count<s%> the <S%H3391>months<s%> they <S%H4390>fulfill,<s%> Or do you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> they <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%>?
"They <S%H3766>kneel<s%> <S%H3766>down,<s%> they <S%H6398>bring<s%> <S%H6398>forth<s%> their <S%H3206>young,<s%> They <S%H7971>get<s%> <S%H7971>rid<s%> of their <S%H2256>labor<s%> <S%H2256>pains.<s%>

"Their <S%H1121>offspring<s%> <S%H9138>become<s%> <S%H9138>strong,<s%> they <S%H7235>grow<s%> up in the <S%H9062>open<s%> <S%H9062>field;<s%> They <S%H3318>leave<s%> and do not <S%H7725>return<s%> to them.

<S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> out the <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>donkey<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%>? And <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H6605>loosed<s%> the <S%H4147>bonds<s%> of the <S%H6171>swift<s%> <S%H6171>donkey,<s%>
To <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H7760>gave<s%> the <S%H6160>wilderness<s%> for a <S%H1004>home,<s%> And the <S%H4420>salt<s%> <S%H4420>land<s%> for his <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>place<s%>?
"He <S%H7832>scorns<s%> the <S%H1995>tumult<s%> of the <S%H7151>city,<s%> The <S%H8663>shoutings<s%> of the <S%H5065>driver<s%> he does not <S%H8085>hear.<s%>
"He <S%H8446>explores<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> for his <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> And he <S%H1875>searches<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3387>green<s%> <S%H3387>thing.<s%>
"Will the <S%H7214>wild<s%> <S%H7214>ox<s%> <S%H14>consent<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> you? <S%H518>Or<s%> will he <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> at your <S%H18>manger<s%>?

"Can you <S%H7194>bind<s%> the <S%H7214>wild<s%> <S%H7214>ox<s%> in a <S%H8525>furrow<s%> with <S%H5688>ropes<s%>? <S%H518>Or<s%> will he <S%H7702>harrow<s%> the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you?
"Will you <S%H539>trust<s%> him <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H3581>strength<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%> And <S%H5800>leave<s%> your <S%H3018>labor<s%> to him?
"Will you <S%H539>have<s%> <S%H539>faith<s%> in him that he will <S%H7725>return<s%> your <S%H2233>grain,<s%> And <S%H622>gather<s%> [it from] your <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor<s%>?
"The ostriches' <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5965>flap<s%> <S%H5965>joyously<s%> With the <S%H84>pinion<s%> and <S%H5133>plumage<s%> of <S%H2623>love,<s%>
For she <S%H5800>abandons<s%> her <S%H1000>eggs<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And <S%H2552>warms<s%> them in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%>
And she <S%H7911>forgets<s%> that a <S%H7272>foot<s%> may <S%H2115>crush<s%> them, Or that a <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> may <S%H1758>trample<s%> them.

"She <S%H7188>treats<s%> her <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H7188>cruelly,<s%> as if [they] were not hers; Though her <S%H3018>labor<s%> be in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> [she] is <S%H1097>unconcerned<s%><S%H6343>;<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> has made her <S%H5382>forget<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> And has not <S%H2505>given<s%> her a <S%H2505>share<s%> of <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
<S%H6256>"When<s%> she <S%H4754>lifts<s%> herself on <S%H4791>high,<s%> She <S%H7832>laughs<s%> at the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider.<s%>
"Do you <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> [his] <S%H1369>might<s%>? Do you <S%H3847>clothe<s%> his <S%H6677>neck<s%> with a <S%H7483>mane<s%>?
"Do you make him <S%H7493>leap<s%> like the <S%H697>locust<s%>? His <S%H1935>majestic<s%> <S%H5170>snorting<s%> is <S%H367>terrible.<s%>
"He <S%H2658>paws<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> and <S%H7797>rejoices<s%> in [his] <S%H3581>strength;<s%> He <S%H3318>goes<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> the <S%H5402>weapons.<s%>
"He <S%H7832>laughs<s%> at <S%H6343>fear<s%> and is not <S%H2865>dismayed;<s%> And he does not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
"The <S%H827>quiver<s%> <S%H7439>rattles<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, The <S%H3851>flashing<s%> <S%H2595>spear<s%> and <S%H3591>javelin.<s%>

"With <S%H7494>shaking<s%> and <S%H7267>rage<s%> he <S%H1572>races<s%> over the <S%H776>ground;<s%> And he does not <S%H539>stand<s%> <S%H539>still<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet.<s%>

"As <S%H1767>often<s%> as the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> [sounds] he <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H1889>'Aha!<s%>' And he <S%H9552>scents<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> And <S%H7482>thunder<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains,<s%> and the <S%H8643>war<s%> <S%H8643>cry.<s%>
"Is it by your <S%H998>understanding<s%> that the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> <S%H82>soars,<s%> <S%H6566>Stretching<s%> his <S%H3671>wings<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south<s%>?
"Is it at your <S%H6310>command<s%> that the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H1361>mounts<s%> up, And <S%H7311>makes<s%> his <S%H7064>nest<s%> on <S%H7311>high<s%>?
"On the <S%H5553>cliff<s%> he <S%H7931>dwells<s%> and <S%H3885>lodges,<s%> Upon the <S%H5553>rocky<s%> <S%H8127>crag,<s%> an <S%H4686>inaccessible<s%> <S%H4686>place.<s%>
"From <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H2658>spies<s%> out <S%H400>food;<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5027>see<s%> [it] from <S%H7350>afar.<s%>
"His <S%H667>young<s%> <S%H667>ones<s%> also <S%H5966>suck<s%> up <S%H1818>blood;<s%> And <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> are, <S%H8033>there<s%> is he."
